nodes.text: Binn Ibes was a male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic in the final decades of the Republic Classic era.

Binn Ibes was a Force-sensitive trained to use the Force and understand the Path of the Jedi by the Jedi Order. A contemporary of famed Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn, Ibes gained the title of Master as well, at which time he selected the Dressellian Initiate Reeft as his Padawan. Reeft would go on to complete his Trials of Knighthood, completing his training under Ibes and ascending to the rank of Jedi Knight.
